text: 11:33 Gumazir Dapaniba 14:5-6; 1 Samuel 17:34-35; 2 Samuel 7:11; Daniel 6:1-27Gumazir kaba me nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Godɨn ikia, egha me Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamiziba ko mɨsogha bar men mɨdorozir gumaziba dɨkabɨni. Me arazir aghuim gamua, egha me bizir God me danɨngasa akam akɨriziba ini. Egha me laionbar akaba dukumi.
